It is forecasted by Digi-Capital that revenue from mobile games will grow from USD 29 billion in 2015 to USD 45 billion by 2018. Under general impression, Android dominate s the download volume in mobile game market. Though the development of smart phone created the market for mobile games, now with more resources poured into mobile game development, it sets higher requirements on players' physical phone performance.
